summary: A former Judo champion is given the chance to redeem himself after he befriends a competitor and an aspiring singer.
cast: Louis Koo|Aaron Kwok|Cherrie Ying|Tony Ka Fai Leung|Eddie Cheung|Jordan Chan|Hoi-Pang Lo|Calvin Choi|Jack Kao|Albert Au|Fan Yeung|Chung Wing|Park-Yin Kwok|Ka-Ho Chiu|Wai Kit Cheung|Lim-Tso Lee|Robin Wan|Tak-Ming Tsang|Yiu-Ken Kwok|Kelly Lau|Kary Ma|Wai Leung Hung|Wah-Wo Wong|Bun Yuen
title: Yau doh lung fu bong
